channel.title: How to reduce lag?
channel.description: Hey, i run a server and its going great, but its so goddam laggy! I got 13 players on once.. and it was lagging like crazy! any way to massively reduce this lag?

item.title: How to reduce lag?
item.dc:creator: @Jonna Jonna
item.description:
@Jonna wrote:

Apparently Hamachi stops lag, but people like no-ip better.

depands what people are doing, mass clicking lags the sever, if it’s that, get some trust worthy players, make them Mod’s, this why they can kick and/or ban mass clickers.

Read full topic
